attributes.action: ban experiments involving the creation of hybrid human/animal embryos
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the Prime Minister to intoduce legislation which bans the scientific community from creating hybrid embryos using human cell nuclei and animal eggs.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban experiments involving the creation of hybrid human/animal embryos."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15310.asp

Prime Minister's Office
